pages.text: $(li)The Enchanting Table is a block that allows you to enchant your Tools, Armors, Weapons and even $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/book)Books$(/l).$(br)$(li)Every enchant gives a different effect.

$(li)To use it, first you have to place this block and right click on it to access to its interface.$(br)$(li)Now, place your desired tool, weapon, armor or book to enchant.$(br)$(li)You will see 3 enchantments to select, and with the indicated cost of XP Levels and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/lapis_lazuli)Lapis Lazuli$(/l) in the right.
$(li)Once selected, you will obtain the enchanted item. Sometimes you will receive an additional enchant.

$(li)Depending on the level of the Enchanting Table, we will obtain lower or higher level enchantments.$(br)$(li)High level enchants will cost more XP levels.$(br)$(li)To upgrade the level of the Enchanting Table, we need to place $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/bookshelf)Bookshelves$(/l) near this block.
$(li)If we want to reduce the level of our Enchanting Table we will have to remove bookshelves instead.
